t:
I watched, surprised, as a mosquito snuck in through the open window and bit on my newborn baby's tiny arm.



Suddenly, the insect's body
shakes and it falls down to join the heap of dead mosquitoes forming on the ground.
c:
Gloria Ramirez: https://www.wikipedia.org/wiki/Death_of_Gloria_Ramirez
Bad wording on the story!



#watch #baby #mosquito #bite #die #poison #revenge #safe
